Below are papers that cite this data set, with context shown. Papers were automatically harvested and associated with this data set, in collaboration with Rexa.info.

from Italy. Wines from three different types of grapes are included. There are levels of 13 chemicals provided for each of 178 instances. The target attribute is the type of grape.
